name: Stardrop Sprint
description:
Stardrop Sprint is a gravity flipping adventure that proves even the smallest hope can make a big difference!

Despite being riddled with strife the people of the planet Earth ultimately prospered. However, peace would not be kept forever as an impending doom from above awaited Earth. A violent alien race, known as the Xenorgs, laid siege to the planet bringing with them countless destruction. Overwhelmed by the alien race, Earth's inhabitants could only hope for salvation...

Unbeknownst to the Xenorgs, this salvation would soon be wrought from the heavens. You are a lone stardrop formed from fate itself. Traverse multiple locales by manipulating gravity on the Xenorg homeworld and save the people of Earth.

Features:
- 6 worlds with unique challenges in each!
- 24 handcrafted levels with many more to come!
- 3 Star rating system for those completionists!
- Gamecenter integration with special achievements and leaderboards!
- Unlockable Levels!
- Addicting 2D sidescrolling action!
